title: Jan Wadas
text: Jan Wadas (born 16 May 1944) is a Polish <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201968%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Featherweight">men's featherweight</a> event at the <a href="1968%20Summer%20Olympics">1968 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1968 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Ivan%20Mihailov%20%28boxer%29">Ivan Mihailov</a> of Bulgaria. At the 1968 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Ivan%20Mihailov%20%28boxer%29">Ivan Mihailov</a> of Bulgaria.
